Summary: standing outside seen a starlike object moveing north north west it stopped in between two stars and brightened then very very slowly started to descend and dim out to nothing
divs: Sighting Detailstaking the dogs out to go to the bathroom when my boyfriend called out that he seen a UFO ..( we see them all the time) we watched it move in a straight path north and then north west and we watched it stop in between two stars and then after a few seconds starts to very very slowly move downwards and as it does it gets dimmer and dimmer until we couldn't see it anymore.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Ogden
There were no other sightings in Ogden on or around November 5th 2013
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
